title.narrative: USAID redacted this field in accordance with the exceptions outlined in the Foreign Aid Transparency and Accountability Act of 2016.

description.narrative: Objectives for Afghanistan: Provincial Planning: ISLA will strengthen the capacity of provincial actors and administrative offices to plan and coordinate strategically by identifying required inputs, developing a budget, and allocating resources properly. Sub-National Institution Building: The project will help institutionalize local government systems and processes. Inclusive Advocacy: The project seeks to improve provincial actors’ ability to represent citizens’ interests in planning and service delivery and advocate for local needs in national budgeting and planning. Public Engagement: ISLA will improve provincial authorities’ ability to inform citizens of government decisions and actions and provide general information, while at the same time, soliciting feedback and creating a dialogue to understand citizens’ priorities and needs.
USAID redacted this field in accordance with the exceptions outlined in the Foreign Aid Transparency and Accountability Act of 2016.

participating-org.narrative: USAID redacted this field in accordance with the exceptions outlined in the Foreign Aid Transparency and Accountability Act of 2016.
